If set, we will attempt to update the gateway to the specified version. If left blank, the gateway software version will continue to be managed through the aviatrix_controller_config resource.

public_dns_server.Description: NS server used by the gateway.

public_subnet_filtering_ha_route_tables.Description: Route tables whose associated public subnets are protected for the HA PSF gateway. Required when enable_public_subnet_filtering and peering_ha_subnet are set.

renegotiation_interval.Description: Typed value when modifying renegotiation_interval. If it's -1, this feature is disabled.

rx_queue_size.Description: Gateway ethernet interface RX queue size. Supported for AWS related clouds only.

saml_enabled.Description: This field indicates whether to enable SAML or not.

search_domains.Description: A list of domain names that will use the NameServer when a specific name is not in the destination when Split Tunnel Mode is enabled.

security_group_id.Description: Security group used for the gateway.

single_az_ha.Description: Set to true if this feature is desired.

single_ip_snat.Description: Enable Source NAT for this container.

software_version.Description: software_version can be used to set the desired software version of the gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the gateway to the specified version. If left blank, the gateway software version will continue to be managed through the aviatrix_controller_config resource.

zone.Description: Availability Zone. Only available for Azure and Public Subnet Filtering gateway

connection_policy.Description: Computed attribute to store the previous connection policy.

dnat_policy.Description: Policy rule to be applied to gateway.

apply_route_entry.Description: This is an option to program the route entry 'DST CIDR pointing to Aviatrix Gateway' into Cloud platform routing table. Type: Boolean. Default: True.

connection.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies output connection where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

dnat_ips.Description: This is a rule field that specifies the translated destination IP address when all specified qualifier conditions meet. When left blank, this field is not used. One of the rule field must be specified for this rule to take effect.

dnat_port.Description: This is a rule field that specifies the translated destination port when all specified qualifier conditions meet. When left blank, this field is not used. One of the rule field must be specified for this rule to take effect.

dst_cidr.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a destination IP address range where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

dst_port.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a destination port where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

exclude_rtb.Description: This field specifies which VPC private route table will not be programmed with the default route entry.

interface.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies output interface where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

mark.Description: This is a rule field that specifies a tag or mark of a TCP session when all qualifier conditions meet. When left blank, this field is not used.

protocol.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a destination port protocol where the rule applies. Default: all.

src_cidr.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a source IP address range where the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

src_port.Description: This is a qualifier condition that specifies a source port that the rule applies. When left blank, this field is not used.

gw_name.Description: Name of the gateway.

interface_policy.Description: Computed attribute to store the previous interface policy.

sync_to_ha.Description: Whether to sync the policies to the HA gateway.

backup_local_lan_ip.Description: Backup Local LAN IP. Required for GCP BGP over LAN Connection with HA enabled.

backup_local_tunnel_cidr.Description: Source CIDR for the tunnel from the backup Aviatrix transit gateway.

backup_remote_tunnel_cidr.Description: Destination CIDR for the tunnel to the backup external device.

bgp_local_as_num.Description: BGP local ASN (Autonomous System Number). Integer between 1-4294967294.

bgp_remote_as_num.Description: BGP remote ASN (Autonomous System Number). Integer between 1-4294967294.

connection_name.Description: The name of the transit external device connection which is going to be created.

connection_type.Description: Connection type. Valid values: 'bgp', 'static'. Default value: 'bgp'.

custom_algorithms.Description: Switch to enable custom/non-default algorithms for IPSec Authentication/Encryption.

direct_connect.Description: Set true for private network infrastructure.

enable_bgp_lan_activemesh.Description: Switch to enable BGP LAN ActiveMesh. Only valid for GCP with Remote Gateway HA enabled. Default: false. Available as of provider version R2.21+.

enable_edge_segmentation.Description: Switch to allow this connection to communicate with a Network Domain via Connection Policy.

enable_ikev2.Description: Set as true if use IKEv2.

enable_jumbo_frame.Description: Enable Jumbo Frame for the transit external device connection. Valid values: true, false.

enable_learned_cidrs_approval.Description: Enable learned CIDR approval for the connection. Only valid with 'connection_type' = 'bgp'. Requires the transit_gateway's 'learned_cidrs_approval_mode' attribute be set to 'connection'. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false. Available as of provider version R2.18+.

gw_name.Description: Name of the Transit Gateway.

ha_enabled.Description: Set as true if there are two external devices.

local_lan_ip.Description: Local LAN IP. Required for GCP BGP over LAN Connection.

local_tunnel_cidr.Description: Source CIDR for the tunnel from the Aviatrix transit gateway.

manual_bgp_advertised_cidrs.Description: Configure manual BGP advertised CIDRs for this connection. Only valid with 'connection_type' = 'bgp'. Available as of provider version R2.18+.

phase1_remote_identifier.Description: Phase 1 remote identifier of the IPsec tunnel.

phase_1_authentication.Description: Phase one Authentication. Valid values: 'SHA-1', 'SHA-256', 'SHA-384' and 'SHA-512'.

phase_1_encryption.Description: Phase one Encryption. Valid values: '3DES', 'AES-128-CBC', 'AES-192-CBC' and 'AES-256-CBC', 'AES-128-GCM-64', 'AES-128-GCM-96', 'AES-128-GCM-128', 'AES-256-GCM-64', 'AES-256-GCM-96', and 'AES-256-GCM-128'.

phase_2_authentication.Description: Phase two Authentication. Valid values: 'NO-AUTH', 'HMAC-SHA-1', 'HMAC-SHA-256', 'HMAC-SHA-384' and 'HMAC-SHA-512'.

phase_2_encryption.Description: Phase two Encryption. Valid values: '3DES', 'AES-128-CBC', 'AES-192-CBC', 'AES-256-CBC', 'AES-128-GCM-64', 'AES-128-GCM-96', 'AES-128-GCM-128', 'AES-256-GCM-64', 'AES-256-GCM-96', 'AES-256-GCM-128', and 'NULL-ENCR'.

pre_shared_key.Description: If left blank, the pre-shared key will be auto generated.

prepend_as_path.Description: Connection AS Path Prepend customized by specifying AS PATH for a BGP connection.

remote_subnet.Description: Remote CIDRs joined as a string with ','. Required for a 'static' type connection.

remote_tunnel_cidr.Description: Destination CIDR for the tunnel to the external device.

remote_vpc_name.Description: Name of the remote VPC for a LAN BGP connection. Only valid when 'connection_type' = 'bgp' and tunnel_protocol' = 'LAN' with an Azure transit gateway. Must be in the form "<VNET-name>:<resource-group-name>". Available as of provider version R2.18+.

switch_to_ha_standby_gateway.Description: Only valid for Transit Gateway's with Active-Standby Mode enabled. Valid values: true, false. Default: false.

tunnel_protocol.Description: Tunnel Protocol. Valid values: 'IPsec', 'GRE' or 'LAN'. Default value: 'IPsec'. Case insensitive.

vpc_id.Description: ID of the VPC where the Transit Gateway is located. For GCP BGP over LAN connection, it is in the format of 'vpc_name~-~account_name'.

inspected_resource_name.Description: Name of the resource to be added to transit firenet policy.

transit_firenet_gateway_name.Description: Name of the transit firenet gateway.

account_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

allocate_new_eip.Description: If false, reuse an idle address in Elastic IP pool for this gateway. Otherwise, allocate a new Elastic IP and use it for this gateway.

approved_learned_cidrs.Description: Approved learned CIDRs. Available as of provider version R2.21+.

azure_eip_name_resource_group.Description: The name of the public IP address and its resource group in Azure to assign to this Transit Gateway.

bgp_ecmp.Description: Enable Equal Cost Multi Path (ECMP) routing for the next hop.

bgp_lan_interfaces.Description: Interfaces to run BGP protocol on top of the ethernet interface, to connect to the onprem/remote peer. Only available for GCP Transit.

bgp_lan_interfaces_count.Description: Number of interfaces that will be created for BGP over LAN enabled Azure transit.

bgp_lan_ip_list.Description: List of available BGP LAN interface IPs for transit external device connection creation. Only supports GCP and Azure. Available as of provider version R2.21.0+.

bgp_manual_spoke_advertise_cidrs.Description: Intended CIDR list to be advertised to external bgp router.

bgp_polling_time.Description: BGP route polling time. Unit is in seconds. Valid values are between 10 and 50.

cloud_instance_id.Description: Instance ID of the transit gateway.

cloud_type.Description: Type of cloud service provider, requires an integer value. Use 1 for AWS.

customized_spoke_vpc_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be customized for the spoke VPC routes. When configured, it will replace all learned routes in VPC routing tables, including RFC1918 and non-RFC1918 CIDRs. It applies to all spoke gateways attached to this transit gateway.

customized_transit_vpc_routes.Description: A list of CIDRs to be customized for the transit VPC routes. When configured, it will replace all learned routes in VPC routing tables, including RFC1918 and non-RFC1918 CIDRs.To be effective, `enable_advertise_transit_cidr` or firewall management access for a transit firenet gateway must be enabled.

eip.Description: Required when allocate_new_eip is false. It uses specified EIP for this gateway.

enable_active_standby.Description: Enables Active-Standby Mode, available only with HA enabled.

enable_active_standby_preemptive.Description: Enables Preemptive Mode for Active-Standby, available only with Active-Standby enabled.

enable_advertise_transit_cidr.Description: Switch to Enable/Disable advertise transit VPC network CIDR.

enable_bgp_over_lan.Description: Pre-allocate a network interface(eth4) for "BGP over LAN" functionality. Only valid for cloud_type = 4 (GCP) and 8 (Azure). Valid values: true or false. Default value: false. Available as of provider version R2.18+

enable_egress_transit_firenet.Description: Specify whether to enable egress transit firenet interfaces or not.

enable_encrypt_volume.Description: Enable encrypt gateway EBS volume. Only supported for AWS and AWSGov providers. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enable_firenet.Description: Specify whether to enable firenet interfaces or not.

enable_gateway_load_balancer.Description: Enable firenet interfaces with AWS Gateway Load Balancer. Only valid when `enable_firenet` or `enable_transit_firenet` are set to true and `cloud_type` = 1 (AWS). Currently AWS Gateway Load Balancer is only supported in AWS regions us-west-2 and us-east-1. Valid values: true or false. Default value: false.

enable_hybrid_connection.Description: Sign of readiness for TGW connection.

enable_jumbo_frame.Description: Enable jumbo frame support for transit gateway. Valid values: true or false. Default value: true.

enable_learned_cidrs_approval.Description: Switch to enable/disable encrypted transit approval for transit Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

enable_monitor_gateway_subnets.Description: Enable [monitor gateway subnets](https://docs.aviatrix.com/HowTos/gateway.html#monitor-gateway-subnet). Only valid for cloud_type = 1 (AWS) or 256 (AWSGov). Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enable_multi_tier_transit.Description: Enable Multi-tier Transit mode on transit gateway.

enable_preserve_as_path.Description: Enable preserve as_path when advertising manual summary cidrs on transit gateway.

enable_s2c_rx_balancing.Description: Enable S2C receive packet CPU re-balancing on transit gateway.

enable_segmentation.Description: Enable segmentation to allow association of transit gateway to security domains.

enable_spot_instance.Description: Enable spot instance. NOT supported for production deployment.

enable_transit_firenet.Description: Specify whether to enable transit firenet interfaces or not.

enable_vpc_dns_server.Description: Enable vpc_dns_server for Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

excluded_advertised_spoke_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be advertised to on-prem as 'Excluded CIDR List'. When configured, it inspects all the advertised CIDRs from its spoke gateways and remove those included in the 'Excluded CIDR List'.

filtered_spoke_vpc_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be filtered from the spoke VPC route table. When configured, filtering CIDR(s) or its subnet will be deleted from VPC routing tables as well as from spoke gateways routing table. It applies to all spoke gateways attached to this transit gateway.

gw_name.Description: Name of the gateway which is going to be created.

ha_azure_eip_name_resource_group.Description: The name of the public IP address and its resource group in Azure to assign to the HA Transit Gateway.

ha_bgp_lan_interfaces.Description: Interfaces to run BGP protocol on top of the ethernet interface, to connect to the onprem/remote peer. Only available for GCP HA Transit.

ha_bgp_lan_ip_list.Description: List of available BGP LAN interface IPs for transit external device HA connection creation. Only supports GCP and Azure. Available as of provider version R2.21.0+.

ha_cloud_instance_id.Description: Cloud instance ID of HA transit gateway.

ha_eip.Description: Public IP address that you want assigned to the HA Transit Gateway.

ha_gw_name.Description: Aviatrix transit gateway unique name of HA transit gateway.

ha_gw_size.Description: HA Gateway Size. Mandatory if HA is enabled (ha_subnet is set).

ha_image_version.Description: ha_image_version can be used to set the desired image version of the HA gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the gateway to the specified version.

ha_insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Transit HA Gateway. Required for AWS if insane_mode is enabled and ha_subnet is set.

ha_lan_interface_cidr.Description: Transit gateway lan interface cidr for the HA gateway.

ha_private_ip.Description: Private IP address of HA transit gateway.

ha_private_mode_subnet_zone.Description: Private Mode HA subnet availability zone.

ha_public_ip.Description: Public IP address of the HA Transit Gateway.

ha_security_group_id.Description: HA security group used for the transit gateway.

ha_software_version.Description: ha_software_version can be used to set the desired software version of the HA gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the gateway to the specified version. If left blank, the gateway software version will continue to be managed through the aviatrix_controller_config resource.

ha_subnet.Description: HA Subnet. Required for enabling HA for AWS/AWSGov/AWSChina/Azure/OCI/Alibaba Cloud. Optional for enabling HA for GCP gateway.

ha_zone.Description: HA Zone. Required if enabling HA for GCP. Optional for Azure.

image_version.Description: image_version can be used to set the desired image version of the gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the gateway to the specified version.

insane_mode.Description: Enable Insane Mode for Transit. Valid values: true, false. Supported for AWS/AWSGov, GCP, Azure and OCI. If insane mode is enabled, gateway size has to at least be c5 size for AWS and Standard_D3_v2 size for Azure.

insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Transit Gateway. Required for AWS if insane_mode is enabled.

lan_private_subnet.Description: LAN Private Subnet. Only used for GCP Transit FireNet.

lan_vpc_id.Description: LAN VPC ID. Only used for GCP Transit FireNet.

learned_cidrs_approval_mode.Description: Set the learned CIDRs approval mode. Only valid when 'enable_learned_cidrs_approval' is set to true. If set to 'gateway', learned CIDR approval applies to ALL connections. If set to 'connection', learned CIDR approval is configured on a per connection basis. When configuring per connection, use the enable_learned_cidrs_approval attribute within the connection resource to toggle learned CIDR approval. Valid values: 'gateway' or 'connection'. Default value: 'gateway'.

local_as_number.Description: Changes the Aviatrix Transit Gateway ASN number before you setup Aviatrix Transit Gateway connection configurations.

monitor_exclude_list.Description: A set of monitored instance ids. Only valid when 'enable_monitor_gateway_subnets' = true.

prepend_as_path.Description: List of AS numbers to populate BGP AP_PATH field when it advertises to VGW or peer devices.

private_ip.Description: Private IP address of the transit gateway created.

private_mode_lb_vpc_id.Description: Private Mode Controller load balancer VPC ID. Required when private mode is enabled for the Controller.

public_ip.Description: Public IP address of the Transit Gateway created.

rx_queue_size.Description: Gateway ethernet interface RX queue size. Supported for AWS related clouds only.

security_group_id.Description: Security group used for the transit gateway.

single_az_ha.Description: Set to 'enabled' if this feature is desired.

single_ip_snat.Description: Enable or disable Source NAT feature in 'single_ip' mode for this container.

software_version.Description: software_version can be used to set the desired software version of the gateway. If set, we will attempt to update the gateway to the specified version. If left blank, the gateway software version will continue to be managed through the aviatrix_controller_config resource.

spot_price.Description: Price for spot instance. NOT supported for production deployment.

tags.Description: A map of tags to assign to the transit gateway.

tunnel_detection_time.Description: The IPSec tunnel down detection time for the transit gateway.

zone.Description: Availability Zone. Only available for cloud_type = 8 (Azure). Must be in the form 'az-n', for example, 'az-2'.

enable_insane_mode_encryption_over_inter.Description: (Optional) Advanced option. Enable Insane Mode Encryption over Internet. Transit gateways must be in Insane Mode. Currently, only inter-cloud connections between AWS and Azure are supported. Required with valid `tunnel_count`. Conflicts with `enable_peering_over_private_network` and `enable_single_tunnel_mode`. Type: Boolean. Default: false. Available as of provider version R2.19+.

enable_max_performance.Description: Indicates whether the maximum amount of HPE tunnels will be created. Only valid when the two transit gateways are each launched in Insane Mode and in the same cloud type. Available as of provider version R2.22.2+.

enable_peering_over_private_network.Description: (Optional) Advanced option. Enable peering over private network. Only appears and applies to when the two Multi-cloud Transit Gateways are each launched in Insane Mode and in a different cloud type. Conflicts with `enable_insane_mode_encryption_over_internet` and `tunnel_count`. Type: Boolean. Default: false. Available in provider version R2.17.1+

enable_single_tunnel_mode.Description: (Optional) Advanced option. Enable peering with Single-Tunnel mode. Only appears and applies to when the two Multi-cloud Transit Gateways are each launched in Insane Mode and in a different cloud type. Required with `enable_peering_over_private_network`. Conflicts with `enable_insane_mode_encryption_over_internet` and `tunnel_count`. Type: Boolean. Default: false. Available as of provider version R2.18+.

gateway1_excluded_network_cidrs.Description: List of excluded network CIDRs for the first transit gateway.

gateway1_excluded_tgw_connections.Description: List of excluded TGW connections for the first transit gateway.

gateway2_excluded_network_cidrs.Description: List of excluded network CIDRs for the second transit gateway.

gateway2_excluded_tgw_connections.Description: List of excluded TGW connections for the second transit gateway.

prepend_as_path1.Description: AS Path Prepend customized by specifying AS PATH for a BGP connection. Applies on transit_gateway_name1.

prepend_as_path2.Description: AS Path Prepend customized by specifying AS PATH for a BGP connection. Applies on transit_gateway_name2.

transit_gateway_name1.Description: The first transit gateway name to make a peer pair.

transit_gateway_name2.Description: The second transit gateway name to make a peer pair.

tunnel_count.Description: (Optional) Advanced option. Number of public tunnels. Required with `enable_insane_mode_encryption_over_internet`. Conflicts with `enable_peering_over_private_network` and `enable_single_tunnel_mode`. Type: Integer. Valid Range: 2-20. Available as of provider version R2.19+.

account_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

cloud_type.Description: Type of cloud service provider, requires an integer value. Use 1 for AWS.

enable_firenet_interfaces.Description: Specify whether to enable firenet interfaces or not.

enable_hybrid_connection.Description: Sign of readiness for TGW connection.

gw_name.Description: Name of the gateway which is going to be created.

ha_gw_size.Description: HA Gateway Size. Mandatory if HA is enabled (ha_subnet is set).

ha_insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Transit HA Gateway. Required if insane_mode is enabled and ha_subnet is set.

insane_mode.Description: Enable Insane Mode for Transit. Valid values: true, false. If insane mode is enabled, gateway size has to at least be c5 size.

insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Transit Gateway. Required if insane_mode is enabled.

enable_ha.Description: Whether Peering HA is enabled. Valid inputs: true or false.

gw_name1.Description: The first VPC Container name to make a peer pair.

gw_name2.Description: The second VPC Container name to make a peer pair.

bgp_local_as_num.Description: BGP local ASN (Autonomous System Number). Integer between 1-4294967294.

bgp_vgw_account.Description: Account of AWS's VGW that is used for this connection.

bgp_vgw_id.Description: Id of AWS's VGW that is used for this connection.

bgp_vgw_region.Description: Region of AWS's VGW that is used for this connection.

conn_name.Description: The name of the VGW connection which is going to be created.

enable_learned_cidrs_approval.Description: Enable learned CIDR approval for the connection. Requires the transit_gateway's 'learned_cidrs_approval_mode' attribute be set to 'connection'. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false. Available as of provider version R2.18+.

gw_name.Description: Name of the Transit Gateway.

manual_bgp_advertised_cidrs.Description: Configure manual BGP advertised CIDRs for this connection. Available as of provider version R2.18+.

prepend_as_path.Description: Connection AS Path Prepend customized by specifying AS PATH for a BGP connection.

vpc_id.Description: VPC-ID where the Transit Gateway is located.

account_name.Description: Account name. This account will be used to create an Aviatrix VPC.

aviatrix_firenet_vpc.Description: Specify the VPC as Aviatrix FireNet VPC or not. Required to be false for GCP provider.

aviatrix_transit_vpc.Description: Specify the VPC as Aviatrix Transit VPC or not. Required to be false for GCP provider.

cidr.Description: Subnet of the VPC to be created. Required to be empty for GCP provider, and non-empty for other providers.

enable_native_gwlb.Description: Enable Native AWS GWLB for FireNet Function. Only valid with cloud_type = 1 (AWS). Valid values: true or false. Default value: false. Available as of provider version R2.18+.

enable_private_oob_subnet.Description: Switch to enable private oob subnet. Only supported for AWS/AWSGov provider. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

name.Description: Name of the VPC to be created.

num_of_subnet_pairs.Description: Number of public subnet and private subnet pair to be created.

private_mode_subnets.Description: Switch to only launch private subnets. Only available when Private Mode is enabled on the Controller.

private_subnets.Description: List of private subnet of the VPC to be created.

public_subnets.Description: List of public subnet of the VPC to be created.

region.Description: Region of cloud provider. Required to be empty for GCP provider, and non-empty for other providers.

resource_group.Description: Resource group of the Azure VPC created.

route_tables.Description: List of route table ids associated with this VPC.

subnets.Description: List of subnet of the VPC to be created. Required to be non-empty for GCP provider, and empty for other providers.

download_enabled.Description: Whether the VPN Certificate download is enabled. Supported Values: "true", "false"

saml_endpoints.Description: List of SAML endpoint names for which the downloading should be enabled . Currently, only a single endpoint is supported. Example: ["saml_endpoint_1"].

base_rule.Description: Base policy rule of the profile to be added. Enter 'allow_all' or 'deny_all'.

policy.Description: New security policy for the profile.

action.Description: The opposite of the base rule for correct behaviour. 'allow' or 'deny'.

port.Description: Port to be allowed or denied.

target.Description: CIDR to be allowed or denied.

users.Description: List of VPN users to attach to this profile.

dns_name.Description: FQDN of a DNS based VPN service such as GeoVPN or UDP load balancer.

gw_name.Description: If ELB is enabled, this will be the name of the ELB, else it will be the name of the Aviatrix VPN gateway.

profiles.Description: List of profiles for user to attach to.

saml_endpoint.Description: This is the name of the SAML endpoint to which the user will be associated.

vpc_id.Description: VPC Id of Aviatrix VPN gateway.

elb_name.Description: ELB to include into the VPN User Accelerator.

account_name.Description: Account name. This can be used for logging in to CloudN console or UserConnect controller.

alicloud_account_id.Description: Alibaba Cloud Account ID to associate with Aviatrix account.

aws_account_number.Description: AWS Account number to associate with Aviatrix account.

aws_ca_cert_path.Description: AWS Top Secret Region or Secret Region Custom Certificate Authority file path on the controller.

aws_gateway_role_app.Description: AWS App role ARN for gateways.

aws_gateway_role_ec2.Description: AWS EC2 role ARN for gateways.

awsgov_account_number.Description: AWS Gov Account number to associate with Aviatrix account.

awss_cap_account_name.Description: AWS Secret Region CAP Account Name.

awss_cap_cert_key_path.Description: AWS Secret Region CAP Certificate Key file path on the controller.

awss_cap_cert_path.Description: AWS Secret Region CAP Certificate file path on the controller.

awss_cap_role_name.Description: AWS Secret Region CAP Role Name.

awss_cap_url.Description: AWS Secret Region CAP Endpoint URL.

awsts_account_number.Description: AWS Top Secret Region Account Number.

awsts_cap_agency.Description: AWS Top Secret Region CAP Agency.

awsts_cap_cert_key_path.Description: AWS Top Secret Region CAP Certificate Key file path on the controller.

awsts_cap_cert_path.Description: AWS Top Secret Region CAP Certificate file path on the controller.

awsts_cap_mission.Description: AWS Top Secret Region CAP Mission.

awsts_cap_role_name.Description: AWS Top Secret Region CAP Role Name.

awsts_cap_url.Description: AWS Top Secret Region CAP Endpoint URL.

wan_interfaces.Description: List of WAN primary interface and WAN primary interface public IP.

wan_primary_interface.Description: WAN primary interface of the device.

wan_primary_interface_public_ip.Description: WAN primary interface public IP address.

firewall_instance_association.Description: List of firewall instances associated with fireNet.

attached.Description: Switch to attach/detach firewall instance to/from fireNet.

egress_interface.Description: Egress interface ID, required if it is a firewall instance.

firenet_gw_name.Description: Name of the gateway to launch the firewall instance.

firewall_name.Description: Firewall instance name, or FQDN Gateway's gw_name, required if it is a firewall instance.

instance_id.Description: ID of Firewall instance, or FQDN Gateway's gw_name.

lan_interface.Description: Lan interface ID, required if it is a firewall instance.

management_interface.Description: Management interface ID, required if it is a firewall instance.

vendor_type.Description: Indication it is a firewall instance or FQDN gateway to be associated to fireNet. Valid values: 'Generic', 'fqdn_gateway'. Value 'fqdn_gateway' is required for FQDN gateway.

hashing_algorithm.Description: Hashing algorithm to load balance traffic across the firewall.

keep_alive_via_lan_interface_enabled.Description: Enable Keep Alive via Firewall LAN Interface.

password.Description: Panorama login password for API calls.

public_ip.Description: The public IP address of the Panorama instance.

retry_interval.Description: Retry interval in seconds for `save` or `synchronize`.

route_table.Description: The name of firewall virtual router to program. If left unspecified, the Controller programs the Panorama templates first router.

template.Description: Panorama template for each FireNet gateway.

template_stack.Description: Panorama template stack for each FireNet gateway.

username.Description: Panorama login name for API calls from the Controller.

vendor_type.Description: Vendor type. Valid values: 'Generic' and 'Palo Alto Networks Panorama'.

password.Description: Firewall login password for API calls.

private_key_file.Description: Private key file for Check Point Cloud Guard.

public_ip.Description: The IP address of the firewall management interface for API calls from the Aviatrix Controller.

retry_interval.Description: Retry interval in seconds for `save` or `synchronize`.

route_table.Description: Specify the firewall virtual Router name you wish the Controller to program. If left unspecified, the Controller programs the firewalls default router.

username.Description: Firewall login name for API calls from the Controller. For example, admin-api, as shown in the screen shot.

vendor_type.Description: Select PAN. Valid values: 'Generic', 'Palo Alto Networks VM-Series', 'Aviatrix FQDN Gateway', and 'Fortinet FortiGate'.

base_log_enabled.Description: Indicates whether logging is enabled or not.

gw_name.Description: Name of the gateway the firewall is associated with.

policies.Description: List of policies associated with the firewall.

action.Description: Valid values: 'allow', 'deny' or 'force-drop'(in stateful firewall rule to allow immediate packet dropping on established sessions).

dst_ip.Description: CIDRs separated by a comma or tag names such 'HR' or 'marketing' etc.

port.Description: A single port or a range of port numbers.

src_ip.Description: CIDRs separated by a comma or tag names such 'HR' or 'marketing' etc.

firewall_images.Description: List of firewall instances associated with fireNet.

firewall_size.Description: Instance sizes of the firewall image.

account_name.Description: Account name. This account will be used to launch Aviatrix gateway.

additional_cidrs.Description: A list of destination CIDR ranges that will also go through the VPN tunnel when Split Tunnel Mode is enabled.

additional_cidrs_designated_gateway.Description: A list of CIDR ranges separated by comma to configure when 'designated_gateway' feature is enabled.

allocate_new_eip.Description: When value is false, reuse an idle address in Elastic IP pool for this gateway. Otherwise, allocate a new Elastic IP and use it for this gateway.

azure_eip_name_resource_group.Description: The name of the public IP address and its resource group in Azure to assign to this Gateway.

duo_api_hostname.Description: API hostname for DUO auth mode.

duo_integration_key.Description: Integration key for DUO auth mode.

elb_name.Description: A name for the ELB that is created.

enable_designated_gateway.Description: Enable 'designated_gateway' feature for Gateway. Only supports AWS. Valid values: true, false.

enable_elb.Description: Specify whether to enable ELB or not.

enable_encrypt_volume.Description: Enable encrypt gateway EBS volume. Only supported for AWS provider. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enable_jumbo_frame.Description: Enable jumbo frame support for Gateway.

enable_ldap.Description: Specify whether to enable LDAP or not. Supported values: 'yes' and 'no'.

enable_spot_instance.Description: Enable spot instance. NOT supported for production deployment.

enable_vpc_dns_server.Description: Enable vpc_dns_server for Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

enable_vpn_nat.Description: This field indicates whether to enable VPN NAT or not. Only supported for VPN gateway. Valid values: true, false. Default value: true.

fqdn_lan_vpc_id.Description: LAN VPC ID. Only used for GCP FQDN Gateway.

gw_name.Description: Gateway name. This can be used for getting gateway.

idle_timeout.Description: Typed value when modifying idle_timeout. If it's -1, this feature is disabled.

insane_mode.Description: Enable Insane Mode for Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

insane_mode_az.Description: AZ of subnet being created for Insane Mode Gateway. Required if insane_mode is set.

monitor_exclude_list.Description: A set of monitored instance ids. Only set when 'enable_monitor_gateway_subnets' = true

name_servers.Description: A list of DNS servers used to resolve domain names by a connected VPN user when Split Tunnel Mode is enabled.

okta_username_suffix.Description: Username suffix for Okta auth mode.

peering_ha_availability_domain.Description: Peering HA availability domain for OCI.

peering_ha_azure_eip_name_resource_group.Description: The name of the public IP address and its resource group in Azure to assign to the Peering HA Gateway.

peering_ha_cloud_instance_id.Description: Instance ID of the peering HA gateway.

peering_ha_fault_domain.Description: Peering HA fault domain for OCI.

peering_ha_gw_name.Description: Aviatrix gateway unique name of HA gateway.

peering_ha_image_version.Description: Image version of the HA gateway.

peering_ha_private_ip.Description: Private IP address of HA gateway.

peering_ha_public_ip.Description: Public IP address that you want assigned to the HA peering instance.

peering_ha_security_group_id.Description: Peering HA security group used for the gateway.

peering_ha_software_version.Description: Software version of the HA gateway.

peering_ha_subnet.Description: Public Subnet Information while creating Peering HA Gateway, only subnet is accepted. Required to create peering ha gateway if cloud_type = 1 or 8 (AWS or Azure)

peering_ha_zone.Description: Zone information for creating Peering HA Gateway. Required to create peering ha gateway if cloud_type = 4 (gcp)

private_ip.Description: Private IP address of the Gateway created.

public_dns_server.Description: NS server used by the gateway.

public_ip.Description: Public IP address of the Gateway created.

public_subnet_filtering_guard_duty_enfor.Description: Whether to enforce Guard Duty IP blocking. Only set when `enable_public_subnet_filtering` attribute is true.

public_subnet_filtering_ha_route_tables.Description: Route tables whose associated public subnets are protected for the HA PSF gateway. Only set when enable_public_subnet_filtering and peering_ha_subnet are set.

public_subnet_filtering_route_tables.Description: Route tables whose associated public subnets are protected. Only set when `enable_public_subnet_filtering` attribute is true.

renegotiation_interval.Description: Typed value when modifying renegotiation_interval. If it's -1, this feature is disabled.

saml_enabled.Description: This field indicates whether to enable SAML or not.

search_domains.Description: A list of domain names that will use the NameServer when a specific name is not in the destination when Split Tunnel Mode is enabled.

security_group_id.Description: Security group used for the gateway.

single_az_ha.Description: Set to true if this feature is desired.

single_ip_snat.Description: Enable Source NAT for this container.

spot_price.Description: Price for spot instance. NOT supported for production deployment.

subnet.Description: A VPC Network address range selected from one of the available network ranges.

tags.Description: A map of tags assigned to the gateway.

tunnel_detection_time.Description: The IPSec tunnel down detection time for the gateway.

vpc_id.Description: ID of legacy VPC/Vnet to be connected.

vpn_access.Description: Enable user access through VPN to this container.

vpn_cidr.Description: VPN CIDR block for the container.

vpn_protocol.Description: Elb protocol for VPN gateway with elb enabled. Only supports AWS provider. Valid values: 'TCP', 'UDP'. If not specified, 'TCP'' will be used.

zone.Description: Availability Zone. Only set for Azure and Public Subnet Filtering gateway

image_version.Description: Compatible image version for the given software_version.

egress_inspection.Description: Egress inspection is enable or not.

intra_domain_inspection.Description: Firewall inspection for traffic within one Security Domain.

account_name.Description: This parameter represents the name of a Cloud-Account in Aviatrix controller.

allocate_new_eip.Description: If false, reuse an idle address in Elastic IP pool for this gateway. Otherwise, allocate a new Elastic IP and use it for this gateway.

approved_learned_cidrs.Description: Approved learned CIDRs for BGP Spoke Gateway. Available as of provider version R2.21+.

azure_eip_name_resource_group.Description: The name of the public IP address and its resource group in Azure to assign to this Spoke Gateway.

bgp_ecmp.Description: Enable Equal Cost Multi Path (ECMP) routing for the next hop for BGP Spoke Gateway.

bgp_hold_time.Description: BGP Hold Time for BGP Spoke Gateway. Unit is in seconds.

bgp_polling_time.Description: BGP route polling time for BGP Spoke Gateway. Unit is in seconds.

disable_route_propagation.Description: Disables route propagation on BGP Spoke to attached Transit Gateway.

eip.Description: The EIP address of the Spoke Gateway.

enable_active_standby.Description: Enables Active-Standby Mode, available only with HA enabled for BGP Spoke Gateway.

enable_active_standby_preemptive.Description: Enables Preemptive Mode for Active-Standby, available only with Active-Standby enabled.

enable_auto_advertise_s2c_cidrs.Description: Automatically advertise remote CIDR to Aviatrix Transit Gateway when route based Site2Cloud Tunnel is created.

enable_encrypt_volume.Description: Enable encrypt gateway EBS volume. Only supported for AWS provider. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false.

enable_jumbo_frame.Description: Enable jumbo frame support for spoke gateway.

enable_learned_cidrs_approval.Description: Switch to enable/disable encrypted transit approval for BGP Spoke Gateway.

enable_spot_instance.Description: Enable spot instance. NOT supported for production deployment.

enable_vpc_dns_server.Description: Enable vpc_dns_server for Gateway. Valid values: true, false.

filtered_spoke_vpc_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be filtered from the spoke VPC route table. When configured, filtering CIDR(s) or its subnet will be deleted from VPC routing tables as well as from spoke gateways routing table. It applies to this spoke gateway only.

gw_name.Description: Spoke gateway name. This can be used for getting spoke gateway.

ha_gw_name.Description: Aviatrix spoke gateway unique name of HA spoke gateway.

ha_public_ip.Description: Public IP address that you want assigned to the HA Spoke Gateway.

ha_software_version.Description: Software version of the HA gateway.

ha_subnet.Description: HA Subnet. Required if enabling HA for AWS/Azure.

ha_zone.Description: HA Zone. Required if enabling HA for GCP.

included_advertised_spoke_routes.Description: A list of comma separated CIDRs to be advertised to on-prem as 'Included CIDR List'. When configured, it will replace all advertised routes from this VPC.

insane_mode.Description: Enable Insane Mode for Spoke Gateway. Valid values: true, false. If insane mode is enabled, gateway size has to at least be c5 size.

learned_cidrs_approval_mode.Description: Set the learned CIDRs approval mode for BGP Spoke Gateway. Only valid when 'enable_learned_cidrs_approval' is set to true. Currently, only 'gateway' is supported: learned CIDR approval applies to ALL connections. Default value: 'gateway'.

local_as_number.Description: Changes the Aviatrix BGP Spoke Gateway ASN number before you setup Aviatrix BGP Spoke Gateway connection configurations.

monitor_exclude_list.Description: A set of monitored instance ids. Only set when 'enable_monitor_gateway_subnets' = true.

prepend_as_path.Description: List of AS numbers to populate BGP AP_PATH field when it advertises to VGW or peer devices. Only valid for BGP Spoke Gateway

private_ip.Description: Private IP address of the spoke gateway created.

public_ip.Description: Required when allocate_new_eip is false. It uses specified EIP for this gateway.

security_group_id.Description: Security group used for the spoke gateway.

single_az_ha.Description: Set to 'enabled' if this feature is desired.

single_ip_snat.Description: Specify whether to enable Source NAT feature in 'single_ip' mode on the gateway or not.

spoke_bgp_manual_advertise_cidrs.Description: Intended CIDR list to be advertised to external BGP router.

tags.Description: A map of tags assigned to the spoke gateway.

transit_gw.Description: Transit Gateways this spoke has joined.

tunnel_detection_time.Description: The IPSec tunnel down detection time for the spoke gateway.

zone.Description: Availability Zone. Only available for cloud_type = 8 (Azure). Must be in the form 'az-n', for example, 'az-2'.

subnets_for_inspection.Description: List of all subnets available for the subnet inspection feature.

azure_eip_name_resource_group.Description: The name of the public IP address and its resource group in Azure to assign to this Transit Gateway.

bgp_ecmp.Description: Enable Equal Cost Multi Path (ECMP) routing for the next hop.

bgp_lan_interfaces.Description: Interfaces to run BGP protocol on top of the ethernet interface, to connect to the onprem/remote peer. Only available for GCP Transit.
